properties.SQL select query:
SELECT 
	Car.primaryKey,
	Car.carbody,
	Car.carnumber,
	Brand.name as brand,
	--SparePart.primaryKey,
	SparePart.name as partName,
	ProducingCountry.name as countryName
FROM Car
	INNER JOIN Brand on Car.Brand_m0 = Brand.primaryKey
	LEFT JOIN SparePart on SparePart.Car_m0 = Car.primaryKey
	LEFT JOIN ProducingCountry on SparePart.ProducingCountry_m0 = ProducingCountry.primaryKey
WHERE ${ObjectTypeName}.primaryKey = ${ObjectPrimaryKeyValue}
ORDER BY 
	Car.carnumber, 
	Brand.name, 
	Car.carbody, 
	Car.primaryKey, 
	SparePart.name, 
	ProducingCountry.name, 
	SparePart.primaryKey

properties.db-fetch-sql-query:
SELECT primaryKey,
	UserName,
	UserLogin,
	OperationId,
	OperationTags,
	ObjectType,
	ObjectPrimaryKey,
	toString(OperationTime) as OperationTime,
	OperationType
FROM Audit
properties.Columns to Return: primaryKey, UserName, UserLogin, OperationId, OperationTags, ObjectType, OperationTime, OperationType, ObjectPrimaryKey
